verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD הַֽלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> from the heavens הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise בַּמְּרוֹמִֽים׃ <S%H4791><s%> him in the heights

הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְאָכָ֑יו <S%H4397><s%> ye him all his angels הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all [צְבָאֹו כ] (צְבָאָֽיו׃ <S%H6635><s%> appointed time ק)

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise שֶׁ֣מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> ye him sun וְיָרֵ֑חַ <S%H3394><s%> and moon הַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כּ֥וֹכְבֵי <S%H3556><s%> him all ye stars אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> of light

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise שְׁמֵ֣י <S%H8064><s%> him ye heavens הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heavens וְ֝הַמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> and ye waters אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> after מֵעַ֬ל <S%H5921><s%> and הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> that [be] above the heavens

יְֽ֭הַֽלְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Let them praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> He צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> for he commanded וְנִבְרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H1254><s%> and they were created

וַיַּעֲמִידֵ֣ם <S%H5975><s%> He hath also stablished לָעַ֣ד <S%H5703><s%> them for ever לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> and ever חָק־ <S%H2706><s%> a decree נָ֝תַ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> he hath made וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> which will not יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <S%H5674><s%> which shall not pass

הַֽלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> Praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the earth תַּ֝נִּינִ֗ים <S%H8577><s%> ye dragons וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all תְּהֹמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8415><s%> and all deeps

אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> Fire וּ֭בָרָד <S%H1259><s%> and hail שֶׁ֣לֶג <S%H7950><s%> snow וְקִיט֑וֹר <S%H7008><s%> and vapour ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind סְ֝עָרָ֗ה <S%H5591><s%> stormy עֹשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> fulfilling דְבָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1697><s%> his word

הֶהָרִ֥ים <S%H2022><s%> Mountains וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all גְּבָע֑וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and all hills עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> trees פְּ֝רִ֗י <S%H6529><s%> fruitful וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲרָזִֽים׃ <S%H730><s%> and all cedars

הַֽחַיָּ֥ה <S%H2416><s%> Beasts וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and all cattle רֶ֝֗מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> creeping things וְצִפּ֥וֹר <S%H6833><s%> fowl כָּנָֽף׃ <S%H3671><s%> and flying

מַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> Kings אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all לְאֻמִּ֑ים <S%H3816><s%> and all people שָׂ֝רִ֗ים <S%H8269><s%> princes וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all שֹׁ֥פְטֵי <S%H8199><s%> and all judges אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth
בַּחוּרִ֥ים <S%H970><s%> Both young men וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again בְּתוּל֑וֹת <S%H1330><s%> and maidens זְ֝קֵנִ֗ים <S%H2205><s%> old men עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נְעָרִֽים׃ <S%H5288><s%> and children

יְהַלְל֤וּ ׀ <S%H1984><s%> Let them praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֬ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִשְׂגָּ֣ב <S%H7682><s%> alone is excellent שְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> for his name לְבַדּ֑וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone ה֝וֹד֗וֹ <S%H1935><s%> his glory עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is above אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [is] above the earth וְשָׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> and heaven

וַיָּ֤רֶם <S%H7311><s%> He also exalteth קֶ֨רֶן ׀ <S%H7161><s%> the horn לְעַמּ֡וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people תְּהִלָּ֤ה <S%H8416><s%> the praise לְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all חֲסִידָ֗יו <S%H2623><s%> of all his saints לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [even] of the children יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַֽם־ <S%H5971><s%> a people קְרֹב֗וֹ <S%H7138><s%> near הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> unto him Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
